word: C. SANTEE: THERE IS AN EVIDENT NEED FOR SOME PLACE TO BE SECURED FOR RESTAURANT WORK. THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE COMING WEST EACH DAY, AND THE NUMBER IS INCREASING EVEN IN THIS SLACK TIME OF THE YEAR. WE HAVE ALMOST AS MANY NOW AS DURING THE TOURIST MONTHS OF THE YEAR, AND SOME PLACE WILL HAVE TO BE PROVIDED FOR THEM. LOOKING AT IT IN THIS WAY, THE DOCTOR HAS BEEN FIGURING ON HOW TO MEET THIS DEMAND AT THE LEAST EXPENSE.
